Summary: object moved SouthEast to North. Either a Boomerange or Triangle
divs: sighting detailsi was skywatching and saw this object coming towards me. moving southeast to north. i noticed right away there were no faa lights on it. it made no noise. a light appears in the upper left of it for a second or two. then it goes out. then a different light appears in the front of it. it doesnt just appear, it starts out dim then gets brighter. i lost the object when it passed over my house and into the treeline. http:\\www.livevideo.com\video\11581a6403d5427da17f748e00ea19fb\ufo-over-boardman-may-29-2007.aspx
